name: Orphanegg
description:
Entrusted with your grandmother's orphanegg, will you take care of all the orphaned eggs and help them grow up and unlock their enormous potential?

You can play the entire game by mouse. 

Credits:

Programming: Willowblade

Art: D4yz

Music used:

Canon in D Major by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3473-canon-in-d-major
